body.p: The Board agreed with respondents’ views that the proposal in the 2010 ED for an entity to disclose the contributions for the next five years would require estimates that may be difficult to determine and very subjective. Thus the Board aligned this disclosure with the general requirement for defined benefit plans, which requires an entity to disclose the expected contribution for a defined benefit plan for the next annual period. The Board confirmed the proposal in the ED for a narrative description of any funding arrangement and funding policy. That requirement is consistent with the requirement for single employer defined benefit plans.
